Title: {{w|CAVES OF }}{{rainbow|QUOLOR}} {{r|+}} {{prismatic|QUONTAINERS}}
Description: A simple mod that adds a splash of color to normally statically-hued objects, and reveals a few normally hidden secondary colors of tiles. Added new tiles for a few characters and things.  New liquid containers, and containers now show whether full or empty. Wishes: {{R|recolor}}, {{R|looklike}}, {{R|looklikecustom}}  MANY AUTHORS = helado, Plutovi, cantorsdust, alividlife
